response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional opportunity that aligns well with your needs and interests. I understand its value to you is $12,000, but considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more. I am offering you the chance to acquire this product for $14,000. This price reflects the quality, craftsmanship, and potential long-term value it offers. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
